dependencies.description: The golang compiler and build environment
dependencies.name: go

dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.
dependencies.name: openssl

dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries
dependencies.name: pkg-config

dependent_to.description:
Apptainer is an open source container platform designed to be simple,
fast, and secure. Many container platforms are available, but Apptainer
is designed for ease-of-use on shared systems and in high performance
computing (HPC) environments. Needs post-install chmod/chown steps to
enable full functionality. See package definition or `spack-build-
out.txt` build log for details, e.g.: tail -15 $(spack location -i
apptainer)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt
dependent_to.name: apptainer

description: Encrypted overlay filesystem written in Go
name: gocryptfs

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
